description: Talend Administration Center is vulnerable to a reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) issue in the SSO login endpoint. The issue is fixed for versions 8.0.x in TPS-5233, for versions 7.3.x in TPS-5324, and for versions 7.2.x in TPS-5235. Earlier versions of Talend Administration Center may also be impacted; users are encouraged to update to a supported version.
